text: Les Essarts is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. On 1 January 2016, it became a part of the new commune of Essarts-en-Bocage.Arrêté préfectoral 5 October 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Vendée
title: Les Essarts, Vendée
